trans-unit.target: 黑暗之主班恩

trans-unit.resname: CLB·267 | Bane, Lord of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, CARDNAME has indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的总生命等于或小于你起始总生命的一半，黑暗之主班恩便具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: CLB·267 | Bane, Lord of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, target opponent may have you draw a card. If they don't, you may put a creature card with equal or lesser toughness from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，目标对手可以令你抓一张牌。若他未如此作，则你可以将一张防御力相等或较小的生物牌从你手上放进战场。
